description: Send and orchestrate cross-channel notifications with templates or custom messages. Manage audiences, lists, brands, user profiles, subscriptions, and push tokens, and trigger automations. Track delivery, statuses, and rendered message content.

capabilities.description: Get an audience by its ID

capabilities.name: list_audience_members
capabilities.description: List members of an audience by its ID

capabilities.name: list_audiences

capabilities.name: invoke_automation_template

capabilities.name: create_brand

capabilities.name: list_brands
